properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 270259Z AUG
   BY M/V WESTERN NEPTUNE TOWING 12 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES AND M/V GECO DIAMOND TOWING
   250 METER LONG CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-23.18S 040-51.37W, 22-55.48S 039-55.00W,
   23-29.18S 040-21.00W, 22-58.12S 041-15.53W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 270359Z AUG.
